description.full: Go for gold! Get into the medal hunt! The winter season is open: Can  you beat the highscore? Winter Sports 2011 offers you nine exciting  disciplines, like Short Track Speed Skating, Biathlon, Snowboard Cross,  Bobsled, Alpine Skiing, Ski Jumping, or wild snowmobile rides.  Prove yourself on worldwide leaderboards and in thrilling online matches  via Xbox LIVE or test yourself with up to 3 friends in splitscreen mode on  your TV. Choose from five multi-player competitions, 16 career cups and  over 40 challenges, and lunge into an exciting race for the record!
